adDetails: HOW IT WORKS? ... SIMPLE & QUICK STEPS! 1.Send us your ticket image or info (call, text, fax, or email) 2.Get free quote in 3 minutes & hire us without visiting our office 3.Relax (never visit a court) & let us resolve all your ticket issues REASONS TO FIGHT YOUR TICKET: •SAVE money, time & energy •NO points on your record •LOW insurance premiums •NO license suspension •NO warrants, NO imprisonments REASONS TO CHOOSE OUR EXPERIENCED LAWYERS: •ALL efforts to DISMISS your ticket with BEST PRICES •ALL types of drivers (including Commercial, Truck, Hazmat, Taxi, Limo, Uber, Shuttle, etc.) •ALL traffic offenses & tickets •ALL California counties •24/7 multilingual support team OUR PRACTICE AREAS: •Speeding •Red light •Lane violation •Traffic sign violations •Illegal U-turn •Overweight load •Log book •Equipment violation •Insurance / Registration •Suspended license •FTA (failure to appear) •Warrants •DMV hearing •DUI/DWI •Reckless driving •Hit & run •Cell phone •Seat belt •Possession of narcotics in vehicle •Cleaning driving record •Expungement •Other traffic related violations CONTACT INFORMATION •Toll Free: 844-NO-TICKET show contact info) •Headquarters Phone: show contact info •Mobile Texting (SMS/MMS): show contact info •Fax: show contact info •Address: 16861 Ventura Blvd, Ste 305, Encino, CA 91436 •Find us on LinkedIn •Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/traffic.tickettarget.1
